std_inline.citation:
'''Baptism''': "eGGSA Baptism Registers, Hilletje Aletta Smit"
Source: Nederduits Gereformeerde Gemeente (NGK), Swartland (Malmesbury), Baptism register, 1783-1809, page 174. Repository: NG Kerkargief, Noordwal-Wes, Stellenbosch, G5 3/3. Transcribed by Lizette Svoboda, from photographs of Cape Archives VC 667
[https://www.eggsa.org/cgi-bin/dosearchBaptisms.pl eGGSA BMD Record] with search parameters Child with smit exact match to the surname with Hilletje Aletta exact match to the first name in all the registers. (accessed 6 May 2021)
Hilletje Aletta Smit baptism on 4 Oct 1801 (born dn 7 Julij), daughter of Jacobus Everhardus Smit & Huijbrechtje Elisabeth Smit.
